channel.title: The ATS MIX Show AboveTopSecret.com
channel.description: The ATS MIX Show with news and views from AboveTopSecret.com members and guests about conspiracy theories, political cover-ups, new world order observations, police state commentary, and related topics.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The ATS MIX Show AboveTopSecret.com
channel.itunes:summary: The ATS MIX Show with news and views from AboveTopSecret.com members and guests about conspiracy theories, political cover-ups, new world order observations, police state commentary, and related topics.

item.title: North Korea - Next NWO Battlefield? - Above Politics 66
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: North Korea - Next NWO Battlefield? - Above Politics 66
item.itunes:summary: Homer and Martin explore why and who might be behind the recent nuclear test in North Korea and the upping of tension across the 38th parallel. With General Motors seeking Chapter 11 protection in the US and Magna, the German Government's preferred partner for General Motors Europe, Homer waxes about the US becoming more socialist, and what things hold for GM in Europe. Martin discussed the EU elections and why Ireland is being asked to vote again on the ratification of the Lisbon treaty. Finally, Homer and Martin talking about the appointment of Justice Sotomayor to the Supreme Court. Does her appointment change to the balance of the Supreme Court?
item.description: Homer and Martin explore why and who might be behind the recent nuclear test in North Korea and the upping of tension across the 38th parallel. With General Motors seeking Chapter 11 protection in the US and Magna, the German Government's preferred partner for General Motors Europe, Homer waxes about the US becoming more socialist, and what things hold for GM in Europe. Martin discussed the EU elections and why Ireland is being asked to vote again on the ratification of the Lisbon treaty. Finally, Homer and Martin talking about the appointment of Justice Sotomayor to the Supreme Court. Does her appointment change to the balance of the Supreme Court?

item.title: "Heroes" Matt Parkman – BTS MIX 52
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: "Heroes" Matt Parkman – BTS MIX 52
item.itunes:summary: Spencer’s guest is two-time Saturn Award nominee Greg Grunberg who stars in NBC’s Emmy and Golden Globe-nominated ensemble drama series HEROES as ‘Matt Parkman,’ a police detective with the ability to hear the thoughts of others. Grunberg is best known as the lovable ‘Eric Weiss’ on ALIAS, where he spent four seasons thwarting the menacing plans of the world’s most dubious villains. Audiences first fell in love with Grunberg when he starred as ‘Sean’ in FELICITY. He has appeared in multiple episode arcs on NYPD BLUE and has guest-starred on shows such as HOUSE M.D. and MONK. Spencer also shares his thoughts on being awakened at 3:00 am.
item.description: Spencer’s guest is two-time Saturn Award nominee Greg Grunberg who stars in NBC’s Emmy and Golden Globe-nominated ensemble drama series HEROES as ‘Matt Parkman,’ a police detective with the ability to hear the thoughts of others. Grunberg is best known as the lovable ‘Eric Weiss’ on ALIAS, where he spent four seasons thwarting the menacing plans of the world’s most dubious villains. Audiences first fell in love with Grunberg when he starred as ‘Sean’ in FELICITY. He has appeared in multiple episode arcs on NYPD BLUE and has guest-starred on shows such as HOUSE M.D. and MONK. Spencer also shares his thoughts on being awakened at 3:00 am.

item.title: We Survived Swine Flu But... - Above Politics 65
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: We Survived Swine Flu But... - Above Politics 65
item.itunes:summary: Homer gets a cough while talking about swine flu. Martin and Homer wonder at Chrysler getting rid of so many distributors and taking jobs aboard after getting a Government handout. We highlight the elections in India and South Africa. Finally Martin gets the opportunity to light up on MP expenses. And its back, Homer's rant.
item.description: Homer gets a cough while talking about swine flu. Martin and Homer wonder at Chrysler getting rid of so many distributors and taking jobs aboard after getting a Government handout. We highlight the elections in India and South Africa. Finally Martin gets the opportunity to light up on MP expenses. And its back, Homer's rant.

item.title: Chrysler - Chapter 11, We Predicted This! - Above Politics 64
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Chrysler - Chapter 11, We Predicted This! - Above Politics 64
item.itunes:summary: Martin crows about getting Chrysler's chapter 11 right last year!!! Homer and Martin talk about its implications, greedy fund mangers and what Fiat will bring to Chrysler. Why has President Obama yet to fire his Secretary of Homeland Security? We move across the Atlantic and offer some advise to UK Prime Minister after a bad week on Gurkhas and MPs expenses and finally Homer and Martin discuss the hype over Swine Flu.
item.description: Martin crows about getting Chrysler's chapter 11 right last year!!! Homer and Martin talk about its implications, greedy fund mangers and what Fiat will bring to Chrysler. Why has President Obama yet to fire his Secretary of Homeland Security? We move across the Atlantic and offer some advise to UK Prime Minister after a bad week on Gurkhas and MPs expenses and finally Homer and Martin discuss the hype over Swine Flu.

item.title: US Military Veterans, Domestic Terrorists? - Above Politics 63
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: US Military Veterans, Domestic Terrorists? - Above Politics 63
item.itunes:summary:
Homer gets tough on comments by Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano that military veterans could be susceptible to extremist recruiters or commit lone acts of violence. Martin and Homer talk about the implications of these comments and do they lead us further into the NWO conspiracy?
The elections in India and South Africa are highlighted and to end, UK special reporter Nef gives us the low down on the UK budget.
item.description:
Homer gets tough on comments by Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano that military veterans could be susceptible to extremist recruiters or commit lone acts of violence. Martin and Homer talk about the implications of these comments and do they lead us further into the NWO conspiracy?
The elections in India and South Africa are highlighted and to end, UK special reporter Nef gives us the low down on the UK budget.

item.title: What’s Under My Cheese? – BTS MIX 51
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: What’s Under My Cheese? – BTS MIX 51
item.itunes:summary: This week on the BTS MIX Show, Spencer and Doc dive into the topics, from the obvious to the subjects that cover the dark underbelly of society. They also have a BTS Screen Test Question worth 6000 BTS Points!
item.description: This week on the BTS MIX Show, Spencer and Doc dive into the topics, from the obvious to the subjects that cover the dark underbelly of society. They also have a BTS Screen Test Question worth 6000 BTS Points!

item.title: Is The UK In Trouble? - Above Politics 62
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Is The UK In Trouble? - Above Politics 62
item.itunes:summary:
"You (The UK) will take Euro membership without a referendum" says our special guest Daniel Furr, about plans to seek money from the IMF.
We interview a political commentator and blogger, Daniel Furr on when the UK will need to take money from the International Monetary Fund to balance the books, something that the main stream media is ignoring. We also hear what Daniel thinks will be in the UK budget next week and finally Daniel and Martin talk about the recent smear campaign coming from the office of the Prime Minister.
Before our interview, Homer and Martin talk about Tea parties, revisit Martin's prediction that one of the big three auto makers will go bankrupt and the lack of ammo for the many gun owners in the States.
item.description:
"You (The UK) will take Euro membership without a referendum" says our special guest Daniel Furr, about plans to seek money from the IMF.
We interview a political commentator and blogger, Daniel Furr on when the UK will need to take money from the International Monetary Fund to balance the books, something that the main stream media is ignoring. We also hear what Daniel thinks will be in the UK budget next week and finally Daniel and Martin talk about the recent smear campaign coming from the office of the Prime Minister.
Before our interview, Homer and Martin talk about Tea parties, revisit Martin's prediction that one of the big three auto makers will go bankrupt and the lack of ammo for the many gun owners in the States.

item.title: Playboy’s Miss April Hope Dworaczyk – BTS MIX 50
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Playboy’s Miss April Hope Dworaczyk – BTS MIX 50
item.itunes:summary: On the 50th edition of the BTX MIX Show, Spencer and Doc talk with Inside Fashion TV Host, fashion model and Playboy Magazine’s Miss April, Hope Dworaczyk who can be seen sharing the cover with comedy star Seth Rogen in the next issue of the iconic men’s magazine. One of the fashion world’s most beautiful models, Hope is also the popular host of the Toronto based Inside Fashion, a weekly beauty lifestyle program that’s broadcast throughout Canada on E! Entertainment Television and Global TV.

One of the fashion world’s most beautiful models, Hope is also the popular host of the Toronto based Inside Fashion, a weekly beauty lifestyle program that’s broadcast throughout Canada on E! Entertainment Television and Global TV.

item.title: Piracy and Terrorism - Are They Linked? - Above Politics 61
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Piracy and Terrorism - Are They Linked? - Above Politics 61
item.itunes:summary: Homer and Martin discuss a change in tactics for the pirates off the horn of Africa. Was the attempt to take a ship with US crew more than it seems. Then they discuss the latest terror threat, and how the student visa system may be used to get terrorists in to the UK, and then finally what is Pakistan doing to counter the terrorist threat. And to end, a Homer rant.

And to end, a Homer rant.

item.title: BTS’rs Incredible Journey PART 2 – BTS MIX 49
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: BTS’rs Incredible Journey PART 2 – BTS MIX 49
item.itunes:summary: This week on the 49th edition of the BTS MIX Show, Spencer and Doc wrap with part two of the Schrödinger's, Memory Shock and In McLean's road trip across the United States. Ian gives us a little more insight to Sedona Vortexes, who made bad menu choices and what he took away from the trip. You'll also have a chance to win 2000 BTS points with the Screen Test on this week's show!

item.title: Political Accountability - Above Politics 60
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Political Accountability - Above Politics 60
item.itunes:summary: Martin and guest host ATS member Budski, who steps in this week for Homer, discuss the G20 summit in London, the continual bonuses to bailed out banks and insurance companies, UK MPs expenses. These are all unpinned by a common thread that Budski reveals - Accountability. Finally the new government in Israeli and PR are focused on.

item.title: BTS’rs Incredible Journey – BTS MIX 48
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: BTS’rs Incredible Journey – BTS MIX 48
item.itunes:summary: This week on the 48th edition of the BTS MIX Show, Spencer and Doc talk with Schrödinger's Dog, Ian McLean, MemoryShock about their cross-country adventures driving across the the entire United States beginning and ending in New York City! In part 1, we cover why they did it and some of the BTS/ATS’rs they saw along the way. We are also back with another addition of the BTS MIX screen test! (clue Holiday Road!)

item.title: Zimbabwe’s Future? Robert Burnett - Above Politics 59
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Zimbabwe’s Future? Robert Burnett - Above Politics 59
item.itunes:summary: In an interview with special reporter TaleRocker, [url=http://www.nextagemission.com/]Robert Burnett[/url], who was born in what is now Zimbabwe, talks about serving with the Military, patrolling a wildlife preserve to intercept terrorists and discouraging poachers in the 1960's. Robert's actions and obvious love of the land touched the hearts of Tribal Elders. He was subsequently initiated into the Metabele Tribe, taught Dowsing, using "L-Rods" primarily to find water. He also learned some of the higher Spiritual practices and teachings that white people rarely know about.
item.description: In an interview with special reporter TaleRocker, [url=http://www.nextagemission.com/]Robert Burnett[/url], who was born in what is now Zimbabwe, talks about serving with the Military, patrolling a wildlife preserve to intercept terrorists and discouraging poachers in the 1960's. Robert's actions and obvious love of the land touched the hearts of Tribal Elders. He was subsequently initiated into the Metabele Tribe, taught Dowsing, using "L-Rods" primarily to find water. He also learned some of the higher Spiritual practices and teachings that white people rarely know about.

item.title: AIG Bonuses, Where’s Mine? – Above Politics 58
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: AIG Bonuses, Where’s Mine? – Above Politics 58
item.itunes:summary: Homer and Martin reveal a new element to the show - Debates, then AIG bonuses and The House's reaction. Martin wonders if the British Government will tax Sir Fred Goodwin's pension? UK D-Day veterans get support to attend the 65th anniversary. Martin wonders if public pressure prompted this change from the Government? Martin reveals there are gaffs when recording the show. And a Homer rant to finish on the treatment of our military.

And a Homer rant to finish on the treatment of our military.

item.title: Prison Cut Backs, More Prisoners, Disaster – Above Politics 57
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Prison Cut Backs, More Prisoners, Disaster – Above Politics 57
item.itunes:summary:
The Walla Walla Penitentiary is laying new officers off and placing a further burden on the community. Who is watching the prisoners? Hear what a Walla Walla penitentiary officer and union shop steward has to say.
Before our featured interview, Homer and Martin discuss the new "cold war" in the Pacific, North Korea and Japan trade "words" over rockets and the recent tragic events in Northern Ireland.
item.description:
The Walla Walla Penitentiary is laying new officers off and placing a further burden on the community. Who is watching the prisoners? Hear what a Walla Walla penitentiary officer and union shop steward has to say.
Before our featured interview, Homer and Martin discuss the new "cold war" in the Pacific, North Korea and Japan trade "words" over rockets and the recent tragic events in Northern Ireland.

item.title: President Obama and Un-Employment – Above Politics 56
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: President Obama and Un-Employment – Above Politics 56
item.itunes:summary:
The latest US unemployment figures get the Homer and Martin treatment. We have pieces by ATS members, Justin Oldham, Don White, xpert11 and frankidealist35 on their views of President Obama and his performance since taking office.
No rant this week but a piece Homer and Martin recorded off air on Abortion and the rights of those in the medical profession.
item.description:
The latest US unemployment figures get the Homer and Martin treatment. We have pieces by ATS members, Justin Oldham, Don White, xpert11 and frankidealist35 on their views of President Obama and his performance since taking office.

item.title: UK Financial Meltdown – Tim Page - Above Politics 55
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: UK Financial Meltdown – Tim Page - Above Politics 55
item.itunes:summary:
Homer and Martin wax about the £650,000 a year pension for Sir Fred "the shred" Goodwin, ex chief of British bank RBS, who have just posted the largest corporate loss in UK history of £24 billion. And Homer is pleased to have got his tax refund check unlike citizens of Kansas and California. We wrap the first part of the show discussing President Obama's pull out from Iraq.
"There is going to be pain in this for everybody" says Tim Page from the Trade Union Congress on the economic downturn. We talk to Tim Page, Senior Policy officer at The Trade Union Congress who leads on Economic and Industrial policy. "Now there have been lots of job losses in the UK and around the world as a result of the economical down turn and there are going to be lots more" say Tim who talks about the important of union membership and how unions work with management.
And then a Homer's rant!!!
item.description:
Homer and Martin wax about the £650,000 a year pension for Sir Fred "the shred" Goodwin, ex chief of British bank RBS, who have just posted the largest corporate loss in UK history of £24 billion. And Homer is pleased to have got his tax refund check unlike citizens of Kansas and California. We wrap the first part of the show discussing President Obama's pull out from Iraq.
"There is going to be pain in this for everybody" says Tim Page from the Trade Union Congress on the economic downturn. We talk to Tim Page, Senior Policy officer at The Trade Union Congress who leads on Economic and Industrial policy. "Now there have been lots of job losses in the UK and around the world as a result of the economical down turn and there are going to be lots more" say Tim who talks about the important of union membership and how unions work with management.
And then a Homer's rant!!!

item.title: Clinton’s Visit To China, Motive? - Above Politics 54
item.itunes:author: ATSMIX
item.author: ATS.MIX: ATSMIX dave@atsmix.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ATS.MIX: Clinton’s Visit To China, Motive? - Above Politics 54
item.itunes:summary:
Homer and Martin question the motives behind Mrs. Clinton's visit to China, and just how much of the US's national debt, China owns. Why has the Texas National Guard been placed on Alert? Is Allan Stanford alive? Hear Martin start the conspiracy!! And why does the EU Court of Human Rights feel it can tell the UK Government it must pay compensation to terror suspects. And off the discussions of the EU, Homer and Martin talk about State and Federal rights in the US.
And Homer's rant is back!!!.
item.description:
Homer and Martin question the motives behind Mrs. Clinton's visit to China, and just how much of the US's national debt, China owns. Why has the Texas National Guard been placed on Alert? Is Allan Stanford alive? Hear Martin start the conspiracy!! And why does the EU Court of Human Rights feel it can tell the UK Government it must pay compensation to terror suspects. And off the discussions of the EU, Homer and Martin talk about State and Federal rights in the US.
And Homer's rant is back!!!.
